attributes.action: accept responsibility for the UKs failure in the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the UKs failure to get points in the Eurovision Song Contest is directly linked to this governments foreign policy and in particular our invasion of Iraq. I petition that the government accepts this view and apologises to Her Majesty the Queen and this Great British nation for the embarrassment heaped on her and the british people as a result.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
